snippet: The Treasury Department said that the vice president of a Mexico City newspaper, Unomásuno, had used the publication to support drug trafficking.
abstract: Treasury Dept says Naim Libien Tella, vice president of Mexico City newspaper Unomasuno, used publication to support drug trafficking gang; bars American citizens from doing business with him.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said that the vice president of a Mexico City newspaper, Unomásuno, had used the publication to support drug trafficking.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: U.S. Penalizes Newspaperman

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of Foreign Assets Control (United States Treasury)
